sentences.en: I was there to protect her from the importunities of lascivious men.
sentences.cn: 我在那里保护她,不受那些好色男子的纠缠不休.

sentences.en: She was a lascivious bitch , this Marcelle, and pleasant at the same time.
sentences.cn: 我发现她很快就把其他姑娘打发走了, 以后我们坐下来亲密地谈了许久.

sentences.en: That man used to be a lascivious person.
sentences.cn: 那个男人曾是个好色之徒.

sentences.en: The lascivious person was put in prison.
sentences.cn: 那个好色之徒被关进监狱.

words.tran_cn: 好色的；淫荡的；挑动情欲的

trans.tran_cn: 好色的，淫荡的，色情的， 猥亵的
trans.tran_en: showing strong sexual desire, or making someone feel this way
